details:
adjective
- situated ahead or going before
= synonyms: in advance
- comparatively late in a course of development
- (of societies) highly developed especially in technology or industry
= example: (of societies) highly developed especially in technology or industry
- far along in time
= example: far along in time
= synonyms: ripe
- ahead in development
= synonyms: sophisticated
- at a higher level in training or knowledge or skill
= example: at a higher level in training or knowledge or skill
- farther along in physical or mental development
= example: farther along in physical or mental development
- ahead of the times
= example: ahead of the times
= synonyms: modern
